title: Sword Art Online Fatal Bullet: The Third Episode - Pilot-ban
content:
Ugh, I had to.

Diving in into this, even for a 3 minutes long slideshow, it was very confusing to make sense of as I'm unfamiliar with the games.
By the looks of it, it's a Bandai Namco production in hopes of marketing a related game, but man, watching 3 minutes and still having no clue of what this was screams of bad marketing in my book.

The lack of colors made it hard to follow, and the absence of music even more so, it was like living inside of a fever dream, it tried to say something, but turned out, we spoke different languages.
